item.title: kfc
item.description:
<!--more-->

<style>
  .coupon-list:empty {
    content: 'Loading...';
  }
  .coupon {
    float: left;
    margin: 5px;
    position: relative;
    background: #F7F7F7;
    font-size: 0;
  }
  .coupon img {
    height: 112px;
    width: 140px;
    opacity: 0.9;
  }
  .coupon h4 {
    position: absolute;
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 2rem;
    left: 0;
    bottom: -1px;
    border-top-right-radius: 5px;
    padding: 2px 5px;
    display: block;
    z-index: 100;
    text-shadow: white 0px 0 10px,white 0 0 7px,white 0 0 5px,white 0 0 5px,white 0 0 5px,white 0 0 3px;
  }

  .coupon ul {
    position: absolute;
    font-size: 1rem;
    z-index: 80;
    text-shadow: white 0px 0 10px,white 0 0 7px,white 0 0 5px,white 0 0 5px,white 0 0 5px,white 0 0 3px;
    padding: 0;
  }
  .coupon li {
    list-style: none;
    margin: 0;
  }

</style>

<coupon-list>
Loading...
</coupon-list>

<script src="/js/riot.min.js"></script>
<script src="/js/kfcoupon/all.js"></script>
<script>
  function main(data) {
    riot.mount('*', data);
  }
</script>

<script src="http://kfcoupon-mcfog.c9.io/coupon?callback=main"></script>
